## GridInitializer.setItemsPerPage() method

Sets current items per page when changed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setItemsPerPage(itemsPerPage: number): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  itemsPerPage | <code>number</code> | Items per page to be stored |

`any`
